name: Rize
description: RIZE Fighting Championship, one of the fastest-growing names in combat sports, is proud to announce a major leap forward in fan engagement and technology: the full integration of cryptocurrency payments into its entire checkout process. Effective immediately, fans can purchase tickets, merchandise, pay-per-view access, and exclusive event experiences using the Solana-based $RIZE token. This move reflects RIZE’s commitment to innovation, accessibility, and decentralization in the sports and entertainment industry. RIZE is elevating the role of its native $RIZE token by making it the exclusive payment option for select merchandise, VIP experiences, and future fan-to-fighter engagement opportunities. Token holders will gain access to special events, fighter meet-and-greets, behind-the-scenes content, and interactive voting on certain aspects of fight nights — all powered by $RIZE.
